title: Which of the following was true of most Puritan...

content.prompt: Which of the following was true of most Puritans who emigrated to seventeenth-century New England?

choices.label: They had renounced the Church of England.
They rejected the authority of the English king.
They approved of the Crownâ€™s religious policy.
They intended to return eventually to England.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
